SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service

Class PreferencesRepository

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service.PreferencesRepository
@Singleton public class PreferencesRepository extends Object
Implements a LiveData-based repository of preferences. It does not provide any preference mutation methods, and is of most use when all preferences are being modified through user interaction with an instance of a PreferenceFragmentCompat subclass (such as SettingsFragment).

  • Method Details

    • getPreferences

      public LiveData<SharedPreferences> getPreferences()
      Returns LiveData of all shared preferences that have been set in application code or by the user in a PreferenceFragmentCompat subclass instance. A viewmodel should then use Transformations.map(LiveData, Function1) (or a similar mechanism) to map the entire SharedPreferences instance in the LiveData returned by this method to LiveData fields for individual preferences.
